meanings.definition: Coming after the eleventh in a series.
meanings.sent1: The twelfth cupcake was decorated with pink frosting.
meanings.sent2: She received the twelfth place ribbon in the race.
meanings.sent3: The twelfth puppy in the litter had a unique spot on its tail.
meanings.sent4: His twelfth attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The twelfth star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.sent1: She ate the twelfth cookie from the jar.
meanings.sent2: The twelfth of the month is her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The twelfth slice of pizza made him feel full.
meanings.sent4: His heart skipped a beat at the twelfth note of the song.
meanings.sent5: The twelfth chapter of the book revealed the mystery.

meanings.definition: The twelfth item in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The twelfth question on the test was the most challenging.
meanings.sent2: He found the twelfth key hidden under the mat.
meanings.sent3: The twelfth player on the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent4: In the twelfth hour, the truth was finally revealed.
meanings.sent5: The twelfth flower in the garden bloomed the brightest.
